name: Basic
description: Affordable access to all essential gym facilities.

name: Standard
description: Enhanced access with group classes and guest privileges.
features: Up to 8 group fitness classes per month

name: Premium
description: Comprehensive access with premium amenities and personalized support.
features: Unlimited access to all equipment and classes
Locker rooms and showers with towel service
Two 30-minute personal training sessions per month
Access to recovery zone (sauna, massage chairs)
Priority booking for classes and personal training
